author: @Dailyhuntapp
title: Inside Story | NIA's 14-Month-Long Probe Into Attack At Indian High Commission in London, Key Conspirators
text:
New Delhi: The Investigation Agency (NIA) on Thursday made the first arrest in connection with the 2023 case relating to the violent attack on the Indian High Commission in London. The arrested accused has been identified as Inderpal Singh Gaba. He was arrested in Delhi.
Gaba is a resident of Hounslow in the United Kingdom. he was reportedly arrested for carrying out unlawful activities during the protests that took place on March 22.
Details of NIA Investigations in The Attack At the Indian High Commission in UK:
Last year in June, the NIA released pictures of the accused involved in the attack. The NIA probe revealed that one of the masterminds of the attack was Avatar Singh Khanda, sources told Times Now.
NIA's Tweet:
\n REQUEST FOR IDENTIFICATION/INFORMATION
On 19.03.23 these persons were involved in an attack on the High Commission of India, London. They caused grievous injury and disrespected the Indian National Flag
If anyone has any information about them, please Whatsapp/DM @+917290009373 pic.twitter.com/Rhy93cFJjA
— NIA India (@NIA_India) \n June 14, 2023 \n
A few months after the attack Khanda died under mysterious circumstances there. It was suspected that he died of poisoning, the sources claimed.
The NIA probe revealed that the attack was organised by Gurcharan Singh, Dal Khalsa of the UK; Avtar Singh Khanda of KLF, Jasvir Singh and many of their associates, both Indian and foreign nationals, who have been identified during the ongoing investigations.
In 2010, Khanda reportedly moved to the UK and soon joined the radical diaspora there. Even before March 2023, Khanda used to openly participate in protests outside the Indian High Commission in the UK.
Khanda was working closely with those spearheading the secessionist campaign 'Referendum 2020' of the banned organisation 'Sikhs For Justice'. He was also openly instigating and promoting pro-Khalistani activites in the UK
Investigations further revealed that the attack outside Indian High Commission in London was the result of government action against Khalistani sympathiser and Waris Punjab De chief Amritpal Singh. and other separatist elements.
Amritpal Singh is presently lodged in Dibrugarh Jail.
Khanda was one of the mentors of Amritapal Singh and was funding him all along. He had also helped Amritpal in evading arrest from police for over one month.
After the arrest of Amritpal, Khanda had formed a committee of foreign-based Khalistani elements to run the affairs of Waris Punjab De.
Investigations further revealed that Khanda lured illegal immigrants in the UK to join Khalistani outfits in lieu of 'sponsorship' for political asylum.
He also actively participated during the 'Referendum 2020 voting' in the UK in 2021-22. Khanda and others were also running a Khalistani TV Channel KTV in the UK.
Last August, the NIA carried out searches at 31 locations in Punjab and Haryana to unearth a larger conspiracy behind the attack outside the Indian High Commission.
The NIA is leaving no stone unturned to pinpoint culpability in the London attack and arrest the perpetrators, their associates and their supporters, based in India and abroad. It has been carrying out extensive investigations into the incident with a view to ensuring there is no repeat of such breach of security, disrespect to the Indian National Flag or any threat to Indian interests abroad". NIA had then said in a statement.
the NIA probe had revealed that the High Commission of India in London was attacked in March by a group of about 50 persons, who committed criminal trespass, caused disrespect to the Indian National flag damage to public property and injuries to officials of the High Commission of India.
An Investigation team of the NIA had visited the UK in May 2023 to probe the attack. As per sources, a crowdsourcing of information was also carried out to identify and collect information about UK-based entities and individuals involved in the incident, based on which the agency identified many of the attackers .

author: chanel0905
title: Eucalyptus Silk Sheets: The Excellent Bedding Selection for All Seasons
text:
Read Time: 4 Minute, 51 Second When it involves choosing the right bedding, discovering a fabric that keeps you comfortable in all seasons will be challenging. The market is filled with options, from cotton to linen to artificial fibers, every with its own pros and cons. However lately, a new contender has emerged as a popular alternative for those seeking comfort, sustainability, and 12 months-round usability: eucalyptus silk sheets. Known for their luxurious feel, eco-friendly production, and temperature-regulating properties, eucalyptus silk sheets are quickly turning into a favorite. Right here’s why these sheets are the proper bedding selection for all seasons.
1. What Are Eucalyptus Silk Sheets?
Eucalyptus silk sheets, also known as Tencel or lyocell sheets, are made from the fibers of eucalyptus trees. The term “silk” in their name refers to their luxurious softness, usually compared to traditional silk. Unlike silk derived from silkworms, eucalyptus silk is vegan and plant-based mostly, making it an appealing option for those looking for cruelty-free bedding options.
These sheets are produced through an eco-friendly process. Eucalyptus trees, which grow quickly and require little water, are harvested and broken down into pulp. This pulp is then transformed into fiber using a closed-loop production technique, which implies that nearly all of the solvents and water used in the process are recycled, minimizing environmental impact.
2. Temperature Regulation: Keep Cool within the Summer time, Warm in the Winter
One of the standout qualities of eucalyptus silk sheets is their exceptional temperature-regulating ability. This is because of the natural properties of eucalyptus fibers, which wick moisture away from the skin while allowing for airflow. This makes eucalyptus silk sheets an excellent choice for warm weather, as they keep you cool and dry by drawing heat away from your body and promoting breathability.
In colder months, eucalyptus silk sheets also provide a comfortable sleeping experience. While they don’t trap heat the way flannel or fleece would possibly, they offer a gentle, insulating impact that keeps your body warmth in balance without overheating. The outcome? Sheets that adapt to the climate, serving to you sleep soundly regardless of the season.
3. Hypoallergenic and Antibacterial Properties
Eucalyptus silk sheets are not only comfortable but additionally beneficial for individuals with sensitive skin or allergies. Eucalyptus fibers have natural hypoallergenic and antibacterial properties, making them proof against mud mites, mold, and bacteria. This is a significant advantage for anyone prone to allergies or sensitive to traditional cotton sheets that may trap allergens.
The hypoallergenic properties of eucalyptus silk sheets extend beyond seasonal changes. Whether or not it’s pollen within the spring or dry air in the winter, these sheets supply a cleaner, safer sleeping environment 12 months-round. And because they’re proof against odor and bacteria, you’ll discover that eucalyptus silk sheets keep fresher longer, reducing the necessity for frequent washing and extending the lifetime of your bedding.
4. Softness and Comfort That Lasts
Another reason eucalyptus silk sheets have gained popularity is their luxurious softness, which rivals that of high-quality cotton or silk sheets. They have a smooth, silky texture that is gentle on the skin, reducing friction and providing a soothing feel. This quality makes them a superb choice for those with sensitive skin or anybody who enjoys the texture of high-end bedding.
What’s more, eucalyptus silk sheets maintain their softness and durability over time. Unlike some cotton sheets that may turn out to be rough after multiple washes, eucalyptus silk sheets stay smooth, reducing pilling and wear. With proper care, they can last for years, making them a worthwhile investment in long-term comfort.
5. An Eco-Friendly Selection for Conscious Consumers
For these involved with environmental impact, eucalyptus silk sheets are a accountable choice. Eucalyptus trees develop quickly and will be cultivated sustainably with minimal water. Additionalmore, the production process of eucalyptus silk is environmentally conscious, utilizing fewer chemical substances and less water than cotton or traditional silk production.
Many corporations that manufacture eucalyptus silk sheets are also committed to sustainable practices, ensuring that their products are ethically made and free of harmful chemicals. While you choose eucalyptus silk sheets, you’re not only choosing comfort and quality but also supporting a product that aligns with eco-friendly values.
6. Easy Care and Upkeep
While eucalyptus silk sheets might sound like they require special care due to their luxurious texture, they’re surprisingly simple to maintain. These sheets can typically be machine washed on a gentle cycle with cold water and mild detergent. They dry quickly and resist wrinkles, making them low-maintenance compared to traditional silk or high-thread-rely cotton sheets that may want ironing or particular attention.
7. The Verdict: Eucalyptus Silk Sheets for Each Season
Eucalyptus silk sheets supply a rare mixture of comfort, sustainability, and adaptability that makes them preferrred for yr-round use. Whether or not you’re looking to stay cool throughout hot summer season nights or cozy up within the winter, these sheets provide the perfect balance. Their hypoallergenic, antibacterial, and moisture-wicking properties contribute to a healthier sleeping environment, while their silky-soft texture ensures an expensive really feel each night.
For anybody seeking a high-quality, eco-friendly alternative to traditional bedding materials, eucalyptus silk sheets are well worth the investment. Not only do they offer unparalleled comfort, but additionally they align with environmentally acutely aware values, making them a smart alternative for all seasons. So, in the event you’re ready to elevate your bedding expertise, consider giving eucalyptus silk sheets a attempt—you might just discover that they’re the proper addition to your sleep routine, regardless of the weather.

author: Jamey Tucker
title: WHAT THE TECH? How to protect your Facebook account from hackers
text: My Facebook Account Got Hacked! It seems like every week I get emails from people who have had their Facebook accounts hacked. And I'm talking about really hacked, not just cloned. These people have lost everything they ever uploaded to Facebook and can't log back into their accounts. Why? Because the hacker changed their password. If this happens to you, it's almost impossible to get your account back. There's no customer service number or email for Facebook. So, what can you do? Here's how to protect your Facebook account (and everything in it) from hackers. Facebook Hacking is Real If you're on Facebook, there's a good chance you've already been a target of hackers. In fact, compromised accounts make up most security issues. A recent report estimated that almost 300,000 Facebook accounts are hacked every day. Once a hacker is in control of your account, you probably won't get it back. Ever. So, you've got to be proactive in protecting your account. How to Protect Your Facebook Account Here are some simple steps you can take to keep your Facebook account safe: ● Turn on 2-factor authentication. This requires a second step to log in to your account on a new device. Even if a hacker gets your username and password, they'll need access to your phone to confirm it's really you logging in. ● Use a strong password. Choose a password that you don't use on any other account. ● Don't fall for scams. Even if a message or post looks like it's from a friend, be careful. Things like "Look who died" are common scams. If you click, you'll be taken to a fake Facebook page that asks for your login information. Don't do it! ● Don't accept friend requests from people you don't know. And don't just ignore them, block them. This keeps them from following your posts. Also, if you get a friend request or message from someone you're already friends with, double-check with them before accepting. It could be a fake account. ● Turn on login alerts. This will send you a notification if someone tries logging into your account on another device or computer. These steps will help keep your Facebook account secure. But remember, you need to do this before your account is hacked. What About My Photos and Videos? Many people store irreplaceable photos, videos, and memories on Facebook. If your account is hacked, you could lose them all. Next time, I'll share how to keep those uploads safe, even if your account is hacked.

author: Devdiscourse News Desk
title: Clash and Control: Tensions in West Bengal's Maheshtala | Law-Order
text:
Clash and Control: Tensions in West Bengal's Maheshtala
Twenty-nine individuals were arrested following violent clashes between two groups in Maheshtala, West Bengal. The conflict, which erupted over a shop's setup, led to injuries and damage to property. The police have brought the situation under control, amidst political tensions and calls for central intervention.
- Country:
- India
In a rapid escalation of conflict, Maheshtala in South 24 Parganas became the epicenter of unrest, with authorities arresting 29 people following violent clashes. The discord, centered around the establishment of a shop, saw the area transformed into a battleground on Wednesday.
The Rabindranagar Police Station, responsible for the affected area, confirmed that order has been restored after the turmoil that left several officers injured and vehicles damaged. In response, heavy police reinforcements were deployed, with three cases registered in connection to the altercation.
As tensions simmered, a political tussle emerged, with the BJP calling for central forces to intervene, while the TMC criticized the opposition for escalating a local issue. The district remains under strict monitoring to prevent further violence.
